ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: Right Unilateral Amputation Above or Below Knee

Complete traumatic amputation at right hip joint, initial encounter
Complete traumatic amputation at right hip joint, subsequent encounter

Complete traumatic amputation at level between right hip and knee, subsequent encounter

Complete traumatic amputation at knee level, right lower leg, subsequent encounter

Acquired absence of right leg above knee
Acquired absence of right hip joint

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent right unilateral amputation above or below the knee procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying right unilateral amputations above or below the knee.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
